name: H. R. H.
description:
H. R. H. or Her Royal Highness is a satirical play on the English class system. You are at home waiting for your unemployment check when it arrives with a bit of a surprise attached to it. Instead of having your name on it, it is written out to the monarch of the commonwealth and has a few more zeros attached to it than you would normally expect.

Waiting in line at the post office to correct the mistake, young prince William, who's mother Diana is also waiting in order to collect her wedding allowance, grabs your check and runs away with it.

In your quest to recover the check, you meet various members of the Royal Family, the Prime Minister and the Archbishop of Canterbury.

H. R. H. is a traditional text adventure made using the Quill adventure generation software from Gilsoft. You tell the game what you want to do via a textual interface and the parser is based on verb / noun input.
gamePlay: Interactive fiction / text adventure, Puzzle elements
